text: Paolo Torrisi born as Maurizio Torresan (1950-2005) was An actor Italian voice actor from Milan. He is most known for his dub roles for animes. His most famous role was Goku in Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z and Dragon Ball GT. He died at San Raffaele Hospital in Segrate of a biliary tract obstruction. Category:1950 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Actors from Milan Category:Italian voice actors
title: Paolo Torrisi
